Displays the world [[Seed (world generation)|seed]], which can be copied on click.

==Syntax==

:<code>seed</code>

==Result==

Always successful.

==Output==

{{Output table}}
{{Output table|edition=je|On success|1|1|the long-type seed cast to a 32-bit integer}}
